citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1700 on 17Jan2024.
Inspector arrived at premises at 1700. The inspector honked the horn multiple times. The inspector did not leave the
vehicle due to dogs on premises. No one appeared on premises. Inspector called cell phone number on record, and sent
an email and text message. The cell number called by the inspector stated that "the person you have dialed is not able to
receive calls at this time" and the call automatically disconnected for each of three attempted calls. No reply was received
to email or text attempted contacts. Inspector departed premises at 1732.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1700 on 17Jan2024. 
Inspector arrived at premises at 1700. The inspector honked the horn multiple times. The inspector did not leave the 
vehicle due to dogs on premises. No one appeared on premises. Inspector called cell phone number on record, and sent 
an email and text message. The cell number called by the inspector stated that "the person you have dialed is not able to 
receive calls at this time" and the call automatically disconnected for each of three attempted calls. No reply was received 
to email or text attempted contacts. Inspector departed premises at 1732. 
 
 
End Section
